mapper.select: SELECT user_id, user_name, sex, status, email, phone, password, img, education, school, situation, create_time, last_edit_time FROM tb_user WHERE phone=#{phone} AND password=#{password}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user( user_name, sex, status, email, phone, password, situation, create_time, last_edit_time ) VALUES ( #{userName}, #{sex}, #{status}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{password}, #{situation}, #{createTime}, #{lastEditTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_user SET password = #{password}, last_edit_time=#{lastEditTime} WHERE phone=#{phone}
UPDATE tb_user SET img = #{img}, last_edit_time=#{lastEditTime} WHERE user_id=#{userId}
